title: Kicked out of own Club?
body: Got league installed into my new hard drive and stuff and first thing I see is that I am no longer in my own club that I created. My friend says that I'm still the club leader but I can't open the club chat or that the club is even in the club area.

replies.body: We can  assist you with this if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with your Club name and tag. Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
My friend had this issue. He submitted a ticket and got his club back within a day or 2.
